name: Alone (itch) (elizabethtan)
description:
Alone is a pixel art style 2D platformer.
Immersive narrative, Engaging game play, Captivating aesthetic.

A robot wakes up in an unknown cave with only her head attached. Navigate through the cave and get to the surface, while searching through rubbish piles to find memory chips and useful robot parts to progress. Discover the robot's purpose, and her previous memories before she woke up.

Walk, and jump across platforms and navigate through portals to reach the end.

Alone utilizes a  green colour palette reminiscent of original Game Boy games.

Contact Me - Elizabeth Tan
